A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am a long time fan of the original Star Wars Trilogy and love them with all my heart this movie disappointed me in every way that a Star Wars movie shouldn't it goes out of its way to establish its new story in a truly unbelievable way. It was visually impressive and daring made. I truly see Star Wars in a different light and fortunately not a positive one. May the force linger with you!
